metadata.title: CVE-2011-3012 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The ioQuake3 engine, as used in World of Padman 1.2 and earlier, Tremulous1.1.0, and ioUrbanTerror 2007-12-20, does not check for dangerous fileextensions before writing to the quake3 directory, which allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted third-party addon thatcreates a Trojan horse DLL file, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2011-2764.

criterions.comment: ioquake3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
